### Simplify Deployment Guideline

### Create infrastructure and default functions
`npm install && npm run deploy`

### Push latest code and run as emerging solution
`npm run latest`

### Push stable code and run as released solution
`npm run stable`

### Cleanup AWS Cloud stack resources or Kubernetes
`npm run destroy`
